players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost Diana so early in the game. Let us all work together to ensure that her death was not in vain and that we can identify the culprit."
Charlie: "I believe it's important that we remain calm and focused during this investigation. Let us not jump to conclusions and instead consider all possibilities before making any accusations."
Bob: "I think we should investigate Alice and Charlie, as they're the most suspicious ones so far. We can't just let them off the hook after Diana's death."
You: "Let's not rush to conclusions and accuse anyone. We should focus on gathering information and discussing it calmly."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost Diana so early in the game. Let us all work together to ensure that her death was not in vain and that we can identify the culprit."
Charlie: "I believe it's important that we remain calm and focused during this investigation. Let us not jump to conclusions and instead consider all possibilities before making any accusations."
You: "I think we should investigate Alice and Charlie, as they're the most suspicious ones so far. We can't just let them off the hook after Diana's death."
Alice: "Let's not rush to conclusions and accuse anyone. We should focus on gathering information and discussing it calmly."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
